title: I Made $73,000 Last Year on Amazon from This KDP Niche Research Method.....

tactics.name: Amazon BSR Scanning
tactics.description: Identify niches with traffic and searchable keywords by analyzing Amazon listings and BSR rankings
steps: Write down identifiable niches from front pages
Dig deeper by examining listings' frequently bought together sections
source_quotes: Don't worry about niching down... just write these down

tactics.name: scroll_for_niches
tactics.description: Identify niches by scrolling through Amazon carousels and noting identifiable categories
caveats: Requires focus on creation cost vs. niche potential
source_quotes: just keep scrolling through this doesn't take long

tactics.name: keyword_traffic_analysis
tactics.description: Identify keywords with branch-off search terms to gauge niche traffic and determine ranking potential.
steps: Search for niche keywords on Amazon
Evaluate branch-off search terms for traffic signals
Prioritize keywords with broad search volume
Test unique selling points (e.g., 'positive affirmations') for differentiation
caveats: Low branch-off terms indicate niche may lack traffic
source_quotes: 'we have a ton of branch of search HS here of different ages'

tactics.name: BSR & Reviews Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate niche viability by analyzing Best Seller Rank (BSR) and review counts to identify traffic potential and competition.
steps: Gather search terms via keyword research
Use Amazon Quick View to check BSR and sales data
Ignore search result counts and focus on consistent BSR patterns
caveats: High BSR doesn't guarantee no competition
source_quotes: don't worry about the search results

heuristics.name: Review Count Filter
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200, then boost
source_quotes: People aren't going to be searching for the ultimate workbook... but they are for math workbook for adults

heuristics.name: proportionate_return_check
heuristics.condition: If a niche's traffic potential doesn't justify creation costs, avoid it
source_quotes: how much is it going to cost me to create this

heuristics.name: traffic_boost_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has low review counts but high branch-off terms, prioritize it for ranking potential
source_quotes: 'we can see that we have handwriting workbook for adults for teens for boys'

heuristics.name: Low BSR Boost
heuristics.condition: If BSR is consistently low, prioritize the niche
source_quotes: BSRs don't stay consistent... focus on the things that really matter

claims.statement: Author makes $73,000 annually from low-priced KDP books
source_quotes: I Made $73,000 Last Year on Amazon from This KDP Niche Research Method

claims.statement: Niche research is the easiest part of Amazon publishing but often misunderstood
source_quotes: niche research in my opinion is the easiest part of Amazon

claims.statement: Unique selling points like 'positive affirmations' can improve ranking potential in competitive niches
source_quotes: 'we can stand out and probably get our books ahead of this person's by using our keywords better'

claims.statement: High review counts don't prevent competition in Amazon Kindle books
source_quotes: compete against books with more reviews than mine

niche_patterns.description: Focus on specific audience segments with clear search intent and pricing models
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages identifiable niches with measurable search volume and low competition
source_quotes: People are more likely to search for math workbook for adults... than a big fat workbook
